response.overview: Prepare for unexpected twists and turns as horror, porn and social commentary merge together to create an adult movie like no other. Borrowing tones and archetypes from scary movies and using them as a framework for an undeniably sexy adult film, you will step into a pandora's box of fear, curiosity, and eroticism. Exploring themes of freedom, resistance and sacrifice, Blind(ed) Date will leave you questioning who has the power to free themselves in the society we live in.
response.title: Blind(ed) Date
